text: avanre pakkalakunnu adrsyakaryattinre khajanavukal. avanallate ava ariyukayilla. karayilum katalilumullat avan ariyunnu. avanariyate oru ila pealum vilunnilla. bhumiyile iruttukalkkullilirikkunna oru dhan'yamaniyakatte, paccayea, unanniyatea aya etearu vastuvakatte, vyaktamaya oru rekhayil elutappettatayittallate untavilla
